attributes.action: Stop Ebay allowing ticket touts to exploit geniune fans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ebay are allowing ticket touts to sell tickets for footy matches and gigs at over inflated prices and therefore exploiting geniune fans of music and sport. These people buy tickets in bulk thus strangling the market and creating a black market where people have no choice but to pay these rip off prices and ebay allows this to go on.
